channel.title: Go on Kishan B
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Kishan B

item.title: Capturing Custom Last Request Time Metrics Using Prometheus in Gin
item.description: We will be using golang, gin, prometheus go library to expose last request time metrics Out of the box metrics Spin up a gin go application which exposes the metrics which comes out of the box via the /metrics endpoint package main import ( "github.com/gin-gonic/gin" "github.com/prometheus/client_golang/prometheus/promhttp" "log" ) func main() { r := gin.Default() r.GET("/metrics", func(c *gin.Context) { handler := promhttp.Handler() handler.ServeHTTP(c.Writer, c.Request) }) err := r.Run(":8080") if err != nil { log.

item.title: Migrating from glide to dep
item.description: I recently migrated one of the go lang projects that i contribute to which is csvdiff from glide to dep. Here is what i had to do. âžœ csvdiff git:(glide-to-dep-migration) dep init Importing configuration from glide. These are only initial constraints, and are further refined during the solve process. Detected glide configuration files... Converting from glide.yaml and glide.lock... Using ^1.0.0 as initial constraint for imported dep github.com/cespare/xxhash Trying v1.0.0 (5c37fe3) as initial lock for imported dep github.
